official_title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the previously existing suspension of duty on fresh, chilled, or frozen brussels sprouts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on fresh, chilled, or frozen brussels sprouts.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the previously existing suspension of duty on fresh, chilled, or frozen brussels sprouts.
